effective.midnightconfig.title: Effective Config
effective.midnightconfig.shouldFlowingWa: Should flowing water spawn particles on first tick
effective.midnightconfig.enableGlowingPl: Enable glowing plankton splashes and ripples in warm oceans at night
effective.midnightconfig.glowsquidHypnot: Enable glow squid cursor attraction (requires glow squid hypnotizing)
effective.midnightconfig.allayTwinkleDen: Allay trail twinkle density (requires Allay trails)
